long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SourceTool helps you save time in your searches for candidates or clients on LinkedIn.

Every time you enter a profile, SourceTool will remember it on the next page of your search and on every new search you perform and will mark it in bright purple. You will always know which profiles you have already viewed and you can save time by not viewing them twice.

Increase your productivity and save time in your LinkedIn searches. Less time searching, more time talking to your clients or candidates. Become a more efficient sourcer with SourceTool.

And best of all, you can use it for FREE.
